  2. BBC and Sky bosses criticise plans to let AI firms use copyrighted material  The Guardian
  3. Sky Boss Dana Strong Raises Artificial Intelligence Copyright Concerns: “I Can’t Fathom How A Small Producer Keeps Up”  Deadline
  4. How AI and copyright turned into a political nightmare for Labour  politico.eu
  5. UK government AI uses models from OpenAI, Google, and Anthropic  World IP Review

item.title: OpenAI's 'smartest' AI model was explicitly told to shut down — and it refused - Live Science
item.description:
1. OpenAI's 'smartest' AI model was explicitly told to shut down — and it refused  Live Science
  2. How far will AI go to defend its own survival?  NBC News
  3. Opinion | AI Is Learning to Escape Human Control  WSJ
  4. Researchers claim ChatGPT o3 bypassed shutdown in controlled test  BleepingComputer
  5. Experts Warn of AI’s Self-Preservation Tactics in New Tests  Men's Journal
